name: amandio c - polar value [shader pimped]
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=3
PSVERSION_WARP=3
PSVERSION_COMP=3
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000

fDecay=1.000

nVideoEchoOrientation=2
nWaveMode=7
bAdditiveWaves=0

fWaveSmoothing=0.500
fWaveParam=-0.400
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000

fShader=0.000
zoom=1.00990
rot=0.00000
cx=0.500
cy=0.860

dy=0.00001
warp=0.01000
sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000

wave_g=0.500
wave_b=0.500
wave_x=0.500
wave_y=0.500
ob_size=0.000

ob_g=0.000
ob_b=0.000

ib_size=0.002

ib_g=0.000

b1n=0.000
b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000
b1x=1.000
b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=1
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=1
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_0_bAdditive=0
wavecode_0_scaling=81.95430
wavecode_0_smoothing=0.80000
wavecode_0_r=1.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=0.000
wave_0_per_point1=i=i+1;      i1=i%512;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=c=(.5*q1)%2;
wave_0_per_point5=gmegabuf(i1)=if(c,gmegabuf(i1),value1);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=1
wavecode_1_bUseDots=1
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0

wavecode_3_g=0.700
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=0.600
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=30
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0
shapecode_0_textured=0
shapecode_0_num_inst=1

shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.06177
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=6.28319
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=0.53426
shapecode_0_r=0.400
shapecode_0_g=1.000
shapecode_0_b=0.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000

shapecode_0_g2=0.100
shapecode_0_b2=0.000
shapecode_0_a2=1.000
shapecode_0_border_r=0.300
shapecode_0_border_g=0.300
shapecode_0_border_b=0.300
shapecode_0_border_a=0.030
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=40
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=2
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.080
shapecode_1_rad=0.05031
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=0.50828
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.600
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.100
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=1.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=c=equal(instance,0);
shape_1_per_frame2=x=if(c,q1,-q1);
shape_1_per_frame3=y=if(c,q2,-q2);
shape_1_per_frame4=
shape_1_per_frame5=x=.5 + x/q6;     y=.5 + .5*y;    
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=40
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=1
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.19978
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=3.20324
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=1.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=1.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=20
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1024
shapecode_3_x=0.380
shapecode_3_y=0.280
shapecode_3_rad=0.01000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=in=instance;     sa=in/1024;   t=6.28*sa+time;
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=d=6*gmegabuf(.5*in);
shape_3_per_frame4=
shape_3_per_frame5=x1 =sin(t);  y1 =cos(t);
shape_3_per_frame6=
shape_3_per_frame7=z=.1+d;
shape_3_per_frame8=
shape_3_per_frame9=x=.5 + z*x1/q6;        y=.5+ z*y1;
shape_3_per_frame10=
shape_3_per_frame11=
shape_3_per_frame12=r=.05+5*d*d;    g=.03+3*d*d*d;
shape_3_per_frame13=r2=r;           g2=g;
shape_3_per_frame14=
shape_3_per_frame15=
shape_3_per_frame16=ang=t;
per_frame_init_1=i=0;    loop(10000, 
per_frame_init_2=
per_frame_init_3=gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_4=
per_frame_init_5=i=i+1;);
per_frame_1=wave_a=0;    warp=0;
per_frame_2=decay=.5;    zoom=1.02;
per_frame_3=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=bt=bt+bass/fps;
per_frame_6=q1=bt;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float2 c,zz,uv1,uv6,tmp;
warp_4=`float dx,dy;
warp_5=`shader_body {
warp_6=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5);// * aspect.xy;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float2 k1 = float2((uv.x), (uv.y));
warp_11=`
warp_12=`float3 ret1 = GetBlur1(uv) ;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float2 zz = uv.xy * texsize.xy *.01;
warp_15=`float h1 = (cos(zz.y*q1) * sin(-zz.y));
warp_16=`float h2 = (sin(zz.x) * cos(zz.y*q2));
warp_17=`
warp_18=`//uv.xy -= float2(h1,h2)*texsize.zw * 90;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`c = uv1*4+float2(-.5,0);
warp_21=`//c = rs*.1;
warp_22=`zz = c;
warp_23=`
warp_24=`for (int n=1; n<=6; n++)
warp_25=`{
warp_26=`tmp = zz;
warp_27=`zz.x = tmp.x*tmp.x - tmp.y*tmp.y;
warp_28=`zz.y = 2*tmp.x * tmp.y;
warp_29=`zz = zz + c;
warp_30=`}
warp_31=`
warp_32=`float len=dot(zz,zz);
warp_33=`uv += .01/zz.yx;
warp_34=`
warp_35=`
warp_36=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv*12+time);
warp_37=`mus = .05/(length(uv6));
warp_38=`mus *= roam_sin;
warp_39=`
warp_40=`float3 blur = GetBlur2(frac(uv));
warp_41=`
warp_42=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_43=`
warp_44=`ret1 = crisp - blur*.03 + .2*mus;
warp_45=`
warp_46=`ret = (ret1*.96-.02); 
warp_47=`}
comp_1=`float effectamt = 0;
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`uv=abs(frac(uv+.5)-.5) ;
comp_6=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*-2 +
comp_7=`              GetBlur1(uv)*2 +
comp_8=`              GetBlur2(uv)*2 - 0.7;
comp_9=`    //ret *= 1.2;
comp_10=`//ret *= bass;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`
comp_13=`//effectamt = 10;
comp_14=`//ret = ret * (((treb * effectamt) * uv.x),((mid * effectamt) * uv.y),((bass * effectamt) * uv.x));
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    float2 uv2;
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_19=`
comp_20=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_21=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_22=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_23=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_24=`
comp_25=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_26=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_27=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_28=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_29=`
comp_30=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_31=`
comp_32=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_33=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_34=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_35=`    ret += 1.15;
comp_36=`    ret *= lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)*(treb_att*(treb_att - q20))),pow(hue_shader.xzy,bass_att));
comp_37=`    ret *= ret;
comp_38=`
comp_39=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_40=`
comp_41=`ret = 1-exp(-ret);
comp_42=`}
